::Rex::

Rex sighs, looking at Battera as she asked her question. He thinks it over 
for a minute before finally arriving at a conclusion.

"No," he says sadly, "I have spent my entire life fighting the Predacons, for 
revenge. I'm used to it now. Peace would be too alien a concept. But I will 
be willing to cooperate."
